abstract: NBA Roundup; Brooklyn Nets defeat Detroit Pistons, 87-83; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Nets scored the final 6 points after trailing by 2 with 1 minute 21 seconds remaining for the win at home.

headline.main: Nets Edge Past the Pistons With a Late Surge
headline.print_headline: Nets Edge Past the Pistons With a Late Surge

snippet: The Nets scored the final 6 points after trailing by 2 with 1 minute 21 seconds remaining for the win at home.
